forgotPassword.alternativeText: If the button no work, copy and paste dis link for your browser:
forgotPassword.expiryText: Dis link go expire for 1 hour. If you no request password reset, please ignore dis email.

registration.subject: Activate Your Account
registration.message: Welcome to Property Solutions! To complete your account setup, please click the button below to activate your account.
registration.alternativeText: If the button no work, copy and paste dis link for your browser:
